title: 86/149/EEC: Commission Decision of 24 March 1986 amending Council Decision 82/731/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Finland approved for the purposes of importing fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 24 March 1986
amending Council Decision 82/731/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Finland approved for the purposes of importing fresh meat into the Community
(86/149/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 82/731/EEC shall be replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 March 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
